org.lucidfox.jpromises.javafx

Class JavaFXPromiseFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lucidfox.jpromises.core.PromiseFactory
      • org.lucidfox.jpromises.javafx.JavaFXPromiseFactory

  • @GwtIncompatible(value="javafx.application.Platform")
public class JavaFXPromiseFactory
extends PromiseFactory

    A PromiseFactory specialized for JavaFX. This factory's DeferredInvoker executes tasks on the JavaFX event queue, using Platform.invokeLater.

    If JavaFX is not available (such as on early Java 7 builds, or Linux OpenJDK without OpenJFX), this class will fail to instantiate at runtime.

      Instantiates a new AWT promise factory.
